page.title: 11A BOY'S AUTOBIOGRAPHY
page.content:
{My life}started on October 10th. 1974 when I was born in Wolverhampton. I had one or two close shaves when I was younger; when I was five, I opened someone's garage door and found a wheelchair. I played with it, and finished by pushing it down the bank. Just then the owner came, so I scarpered like mad. I wouldn't like that to happen again.
I like drawing, sprinting and karate. My Dad's job is in advertising; he does advertisements for the T.A. to get more recruits.
I am not looking forward to going into the Secondary school, as they are very strict! My ambition is to be in the S.A.S.
{@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
